title: Get COMPANY-has-prime-image Relationship
user_story:
As an API consumer\
I want to be able to request the prime image of a COMPANY\
So I can represent the node in the best possible form in my frontend application\
(Because I don't know which image from the node's gallery is the best one)
description:
* The ›has-prime-image‹ relationship for the selected COMPANY is returned when one exists. -> Status Code \`200\`
* The response contains the relationship ID and the two node IDs, but not the nodes itself.
* An empty response is returned when the the selected COMPANY has no ›has-prime-image‹ relationship. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This can happen when there exists no node with the given ID or it is not a COMPANY. -> Status Code \`404\`
